author: pieber
msg: [KARAF-1207,KARAF-1135,KARAF-1163] Fix guava version conflict with build
This one was reached by upgrading to exam 2.3.1 which removes the need
of guava for exam compltely (and therefore avoid all conflicts with
guava). Therefore we can also upgrade to guava 11.0.1
